header.title: AI Matching Rules Configuration
header.description: Configure how the system matches volunteers with residents based on skills, availability, and other factors.

skills.title: Skill Weights
skills.description: Adjust importance of different matching factors

advancedConfig.title: Advanced Configuration
advancedConfig.description: Additional matching rules are available for fine-tuning the volunteer-resident matching algorithm.

ruleDescriptions.skills-match: Importance of matching volunteer skills with resident needs.
ruleDescriptions.language-match: Importance of matching languages spoken by volunteer and resident.
ruleDescriptions.availability-match: Importance of matching volunteer and resident availability.
ruleDescriptions.require-exact-availability: Require exact time match for volunteer availability.
ruleDescriptions.gender-match: Should gender be considered in matching?
ruleDescriptions.age-proximity: Importance of age similarity between volunteer and resident.
ruleDescriptions.prioritize-least-visits: Give higher priority to residents who have had the fewest visits recently.

testDialog.title: Test Matching Rules
testDialog.description: Test your matching rules against the current volunteer and resident data.
testDialog.noData: No data available. Please add volunteers, residents, and rules in the system.

reasons.Resident has not specified any required: Resident has not specified any required skills.
reasons.All required resident skills are present: All required resident skills are present in the volunteer's skill set.
reasons.Volunteer does not possess any of the re: Volunteer does not possess any of the resident's required skills.
Volunteer skills matched: [${matched}]. Required but missing: [${missing}].
reasons.No hobbies specified for volunteer or re: No hobbies specified for volunteer or resident.
reasons.Volunteer and resident share all listed: Volunteer and resident share all listed hobbies.
reasons.No shared hobbies between volunteer and: No shared hobbies between volunteer and resident.
reasons.Shared hobbies: [${matched}]. Resident's: Shared hobbies: [${matched}]. Resident's hobbies not shared: [${missing}].
reasons.No languages specified for volunteer or: No languages specified for volunteer or resident.
reasons.Volunteer speaks all languages required: Volunteer speaks all languages required by the resident.
reasons.Volunteer does not speak any of the resi: Volunteer does not speak any of the resident's required languages.
reasons.Languages in common: [${matched}]. Resid: Languages in common: [${matched}]. Resident's required languages not spoken: [${missing}].
reasons.Resident has not specified any required: Resident has not specified any required availability.
reasons.Volunteer is available for all of the re: Volunteer is available for all of the resident's requested time slots.
reasons.Volunteer is not available for any of th: Volunteer is not available for any of the resident's requested time slots.
reasons.Volunteer fulfills every exact time slot: Volunteer fulfills every exact time slot required by the resident.
reasons.Volunteer does not meet the following re: Volunteer does not meet the following required time slots: [${missingSlots}]. (All must be met for a perfect match.)
reasons.Gender information is missing for volunt: Gender information is missing for volunteer or resident.
reasons.Volunteer and resident have the same gen: Volunteer and resident have the same gender: [${v.gender}].
reasons.Birth date is missing for volunteer or r: Birth date is missing for volunteer or resident.
reasons.Volunteer is ${a} years old, resident is: Volunteer is ${a} years old, resident is ${b} years old. Age difference: ${Math.abs(a - b)} years.
reasons.No residents have received any visits ye: No residents have received any visits yet.
reasons.Resident has received ${sessions} visits: Resident has received ${sessions} visits. The most visited resident has ${ctx.maxSessions} visits.

previewDialog.title: Preview Matching
previewDialog.description: Preview how volunteers and residents would be matched with current rules.
previewDialog.promptVolunteer: Select a volunteer to preview matching results.
previewDialog.promptResident: Select a resident to preview matching results.

resetDialog.title: Reset Matching Rules
resetDialog.confirmTitle: Are you sure you want to reset all matching rules to their default values?
resetDialog.confirmMessage: This will permanently discard all your custom settings and affect how the AI matches volunteers to residents.

addRule.title: Add New Rule
addRule.description: Fill in the details and click Add.
addRule.name: Name
